metadata.title: KATOV - Creative website services
metadata.description: Creative and professional website development services. Minimal design, maximum impact.

hero.name: Katov
hero.title: Not standard, creative solution
hero.description: Minimal design. Maximum impact. We help your brand stand out in the online world.

about.title: Who is KATOV?
about.description: KATOV is a studio that creates creative and reliable web solutions. We build websites not just for looks, but for results.
about.description2: Every project is focused on clear goals, understandable structure, and real results. We combine design tailored to your business, modern technologies, and convenient management.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Every website must serve the brand!

landing.title: Landing Page
landing.description: Single-page websites for fast and effective sales boost.

corporate.title: Corporate Website
corporate.description: Complete website that creates your company's professional image.

ecommerce.title: Online Store
ecommerce.description: Modern e-commerce solutions to sell your products online.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your project

minimal.name: Minimal
minimal.description: Sales-focused 2-5 page website and lead collection system.
minimal.description2: For launches, landing pages, or simple business card sites. Quick to deploy and shows results.
minimal.feature2: Strong offer and clear CTA structure
minimal.feature4: Basic SEO setup and site speed optimization

standart.name: Standard
standart.description: For automating business processes and analyzing users.
standart.description2: With admin panel, analytics, Telegram bot, and internal process management. A convenient solution for businesses ready to grow.
standart.feature2: Admin panel for lead and traffic management

individual.name: Individual
individual.description2: Full platform, individual strategy, and technical solutions. Built from scratch and grows with your business.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Let's bring your idea to life!
contact.description: Let's explore together how to turn your project into results.

footer.description: Professional services for creating creative websites.
